nodes.text: Zem was a Human male who ran a small shop in the city of Olaris on Taris during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Zem was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare in 2011. He appears on the Republic version of the planet Taris, as a Specialty Goods vendor in Olaris.
